entry.title: MB2 (double bird hanging)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bird Hangings
Price: 7.00

If you enjoy nature and Birds, you will love this whimsical felted Bird. The Birds are so sweet, and can be used to bring joy anywhere you like or simply décor in your children's room. This will make a lovely gift for your customers or a felt craft lover.

Please note that this Bird is for decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.

comes in assortment of colours.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.at to dry.
size: 7" w x 3" ht.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: EBH-11 (red crested cardinal)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bird Hangings
Price: 5.50

This Red Crested Cardinal is sculpted by needle felting and could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. The red-crested cardinal is common in the lowlands of Hawaiian islands. Native to South America, it was introduced to Oahu around 1930. It is also known as Brazilian Cardinal. 

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.
size: 5.5 inches long

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.

entry.title: EBH-8 (kingfisher)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bird Hangings
Price: 4.00

This Kingfisher is sculpted by needle felting and could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. Kingfishers are a group of small to medium-sized, brightly coloured birds in the order Coraciiformes. The are found in Asia, Africa, Australia, and South America; some species in Europe and North America. They live along banks of rivers and lakes, forest and open woodland, a few species along seashores or in deserts.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.
size: 3.5 inches long

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.

entry.title: EBH-7 (pink robin)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bird Hangings
Price: 4.00

This Pink Robin is sculpted by needle felting and could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. The Pink Robin is unusual amongst birds in that both the male and female have pink colouring – so often, only the males of a species display bright colouring to attract their mate. The contrast of the males’ black head and wings with bright pink chest make it one of the most striking Australian small birds.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.
size: 3" long

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

This American Goldfinch is sculpted by needle felting. It is made of 100% wool and could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. American Goldfinch are found across southern Canada from British Columbia to Newfoundland and through most of the United States north of the Gulf and core Southwestern States. Its winter range includes southern British Columbia, Manitoba, Ontario, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and most of the United States.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Bird Hangings
Price: 5.00

This Scarlet Tanger is sculpted by needle felting. It is made of 100% wool and could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. The Scarlet Tanager are found across large forested areas across eastern North America. They love to build a cup nest on horizontal tree branches and do their best in the forest interior. Unfortunately, their numbers are declining due to forest fragmentation. 

Our felted pal would make a great gift for all the bird lovers. 

size: 5" long
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
